title: Front door
text: The stone steps leading up to the door are crumbling. The columns at the end of the stair landing support canopy above and you see a balcony on the first floor. Someone has defaced the columns with grotesque drawings. The front door is cracked, and the paint has chipped off in several places. Around the doorknob, there are signs of frequent use. The side windows next to the door are dirty, offering no hint of what lies behind them.

actions.actText: You push down the handle but the door is locked.
